TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi VirtualizingStackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class VirtualizingStackPanel Inherits VirtualizingPanel Implements IScrollInfo

summary.span: 在水平或垂直的一行中排列并显示内容。

span.span: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并处理从(如或) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items. 中的虚拟化面板中包含的项控件创建其自己的项容器时，才发生。Virtualization in a only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers. 你可以确保通过使用数据绑定将发生这种情况。You can ensure this happens by using data binding. 在其中创建和添加到项控件项容器的情况下通过提供任何性能优势。In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a offers no performance advantage over a . 是的默认项宿主元素。 is the default items host for the element. 默认情况下，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性设置为`true`。By default, the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `true`. 当`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性设置为`false`、行为与普通相同。When the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `false`, a behaves the same as an ordinary . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将绑定到 XML 数据源和虚拟化中显示的项元素使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 请注意，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的属性显式设置为`true`。Notice that the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xaml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)] 下面的示例创建和设置`VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode`附加到属性。The following example creates a and sets the `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` attached property to . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下面的示例演示使用上一示例中的数据。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并处理从(如或) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void LineDown() cil managed

summary.span: 将内容向下滚动一个逻辑单位。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写此方法在派生类以更改堆叠面板滚动内容向下的方式。You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward. 例如，你可以内容向下滚动而不是一个两个单位。For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当滚动时，不会增加布局大小，但有效地将其子代添加 z 平面上，这通常由父元素裁剪 (通常) 到堆栈的大小。When scrolling, does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a ) to the size of the stack.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写更改堆栈面板响应鼠标滚轮下操作的方式派生的类中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PageDown() cil managed

summary.span: 将内容向下滚动一页。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写更改堆栈面板响应 page down 操作的方式派生的类中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page down action. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PageLeft() cil managed

summary.span: 将内容向左滚动一页。

span.span: Scrolls content to the left by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写更改堆栈面板响应保留操作页的方式派生的类中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page left action. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PageRight() cil managed

summary.span: 将内容向右滚动一页。

span.span: Scrolls content to the right by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写更改堆叠面板对页正确的操作的响应方式派生的类中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page right action. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PageUp() cil managed

summary.span: 将内容向上滚动一页。

span.span: Scrolls content upward by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写更改堆栈面板响应 page up 操作的方式派生的类中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page up action. 如果您需要物理滚动而不逻辑滚动，包装中并设置其属性`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在这种情况下，提供滚动，并且虚拟化处于禁用状态。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void RemoveCleanUpVirtualizedItemHandler (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler handler);

.method public static hidebysig void RemoveCleanUpVirtualizedItemHandler(class System.Windows.DependencyObject element, class System.Windows.Controls.CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler handler) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RemoveCleanUpVirtualizedItemHandler (element As DependencyObject, handler As CleanUpVirtualizedItemEventHandler)

param.name: element
param.span: 要从其中移除处理程序的 。

span.span: The from which the handler is being removed.

param.name: handler
param.span: 指定要移除的事件处理程序。

span.span: Specifies the event handler that is to be removed.

summary.span: 移除 附加事件的事件处理程序。

span.span: Removes an event handler for the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标准布局系统创建项容器，并计算每个项与列表控件关联的布局。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. 单词"虚拟化"是指一种技术所依据的子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素生成从更大的多个数据项基于屏幕上所显示的项。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 生成多个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]元素只有少数元素可能在屏幕上时可以对你的应用程序的性能产生负面影响。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 计算可见项的数目，并处理从(如或) 创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]只为可见项的元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件是，将启用物理滚动。If a control is the , physical scrolling is enabled. 如果是，滚动，则逻辑子元素。If a is the , scrolling is logical by child element.
